attributes.action: require MPs to publish at least annually details of the expense claims they have made as members of Parliament
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A recent vote in the House of Commons exempted MPs from at least some of the requirements of the Freedom of Information Act.  This will give MPs the possibility of not having to publish their expense claims.  As MPs' expenses are paid for by the British public they should be open to public scrutiny.
